meta.title: Reset data and import content
meta.description: It resets dedault data before importing custom content
meta.author: juanmaguitar

steps.data: <?php  /* log_content_state() definition */  namespace MyPlayground\Utils\Debug; require '/wordpress/wp-load.php'; function log_content_state($message) { $args = ['post_type' => 'post', 'post_status' => 'publish', 'posts_per_page' => -1]; $posts = get_posts($args); error_log($message); if (!empty($posts)) { $last_post = $posts[count($posts) - 1]; error_log(count($posts) . ' posts - Last Post title: ' . $last_post->post_title); } else { error_log('No posts found'); } }

steps.code: <?php /* Log state content by default */ require '/wordpress/wp-load.php'; MyPlayground\Utils\Debug\log_content_state('Last post by default');
<?php /* Log state content after resetData */  require '/wordpress/wp-load.php'; MyPlayground\Utils\Debug\log_content_state('Last post after resetData');
<?php /* Log state content after importWxr */ require '/wordpress/wp-load.php'; MyPlayground\Utils\Debug\log_content_state('Last post after importWxr');
